room_title: Escape room "Eye Spy" by Panic Room CDA in Coeur d'Alene
review: Very fun! We had a great time. We did the Eye-Spy room and are planning to do the Pirate's Lair next time. The owners do a great job. Thank you for a fun evening out.

room_title: Escape room "Eye Spy" by Panic Room CDA in Coeur d'Alene
review: We had an absolutely wonderful time! We loved the spy theme and immediately got into our roles as mystery solvers! Everyone in our group (6 of us - all ages) had a great time, and we solved our room in the perfect amount of time with no clues. I would recommend this to everyone who enjoys fun, group activities!

room_title: Escape room "Eye Spy" by Panic Room CDA in Coeur d'Alene
review: My boyfriend and I had a blast in the EyeSpy room this past week! Definitely challenging but you are allowed up to 3 hints if/when you get stuck. The staff was very friendly and professional and it was easy to book our appt online. Would recommend on a rainy day or when you need a break from the sun!
